catalogue_raissonne: Murase, Art through a Lifetime, no. 244
creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, Gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: 3/4 portrait of a young woman gazing outward, with her eyes slightly crossed; thick layered, beige and white kimono; she is loosely clutching a red brocaded cloak just below shoulders, with index finger pointing downward; richly decorated navy obi with dragon and flaming pearl
markings: center R edge red artist\'s seals: 字曰伯立 {Azana iwaku Hakuryū}, せいとく {Seitoku}
medium: Ink, color, and gold on silk
provenance: Manno Art Museum (until 2003); Sebastian Izzard; Mary Burke (2003–2015)
signed: center R edge: {Heian Seitoku sha} (Painted by Heian Seitoku)
title: Kamigata Beauty
